name: Dr. X Name
bio: Dr. X Name serves as the Faculty Advisor for IAESTE LC JECRC, providing guidance and support to ensure the success of our international exchange programs. With extensive experience in international education, Dr. X helps bridge the gap between academic excellence and global opportunities.

name: Pooja Kumari
bio: Pooja Kumari leads strategic initiatives and oversees the day-to-day operations of IAESTE LC JECRC. With a passion for international exchange, she works tirelessly to create opportunities for students to gain global experience.

name: John Doe
bio: John Doe serves as the President, leading the organization with vision and dedication. He coordinates with all departments to ensure smooth operations and successful program execution.

name: Jane Smith
bio: Jane Smith heads the Outgoing Department, helping students navigate the application process for international internships. Her expertise ensures students find the best opportunities worldwide.

name: Alice Johnson
bio: Alice Johnson manages the Incoming Department, ensuring international students have a memorable and enriching experience during their stay in India.

name: Bob Williams
bio: Bob Williams leads the Marketing Department, creating engaging content and campaigns to promote IAESTE programs and attract new members.

name: Carol Brown
bio: Carol Brown organizes exciting events and workshops that bring the IAESTE community together and create lasting memories for all participants.

name: David Miller
bio: David Miller manages the financial operations of the organization, ensuring transparency and efficient resource allocation for all programs.

name: Emma Davis
bio: Emma Davis assists students with all documentation needs, making the visa and travel process as smooth as possible.

name: Frank Wilson
bio: Frank Wilson maintains the organization's digital infrastructure and develops tools to enhance member experience and operational efficiency.

name: Grace Moore
bio: Grace Moore builds and maintains relationships with partners, sponsors, and stakeholders to support the organization's growth and mission.
